HotelElement.Name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Atlanta Northlake

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Towneplace Suites By Marriott Atlanta Northlake in Atlanta (Northlake), you'll be minutes from Northlake Mall and close to RE-MAX Greater Atlanta Stadium. This family-friendly hotel is within the vicinity of James R. Hallford Stadium and Oglethorpe University.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 98 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and barbecue grills.

Dining
A complimentary continental breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
